paper_abstract: Using the geometric dual technique by Berstel and Pocchiola, we give a uniform O(n(3)) upper bound for the arithmetical complexity of a Sturmian word. We also give explicit expressions for the arithmetical complexity of Sturmian words of slope between 1/3 and 2/3 (in particular, of the Fibonacci word). In this case, the difference between the genuine arithmetical complexity function and our upper bound is bounded, and ultimately 2-periodic. In fact, our formula is valid not only for Sturmian words but for rotation words from a wider class. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the arithmetical complexity of Sturmian words
